Articles.Content: Hi! I am planet missions. Ksp is my favourite game! I have explored Minmmus,Mun and i landed on duna for the first time today.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Yes Duna is beautiful and bob loves it! He is going to die on Duna.![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif) The next thing i am going do on ksp is sending a satellite to orbit Duna!![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
Very good job! Welcome to the forums and enjoy your stay.
Nicely done! Getting to another planet for the first time is a huge accomplishment. Too bad about Bob, is there hope for a rescue?

> 
> Nicely done! Getting to another planet for the first time is a huge accomplishment. Too bad about Bob, is there hope for a rescue?

There's always hope for a rescue! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Unless you've got life support mods... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Welcome to the Forum!

> 
> Unless you've got life support mods... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

That can be rectified with a "few" extra Km/s of Delta-V. You'd have to be a madman, though...

Anyway, plate of cookies!

Blllluhhhhheeee!?!!!!!!! MY OLD SELF!!!!? Wow, thats pretty amazing yes i sure remember you. But now i am impersonating or more likely 'am' the new planet missions i got bored of that name quiet fast... But............".......................

>

I did not know about 'mods' then i was only a begginer and had just got into the full version!

(for more info look [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/143663-my-ksp-story/#comment-2673388))

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-20T10:26:04Z" title="07/20/2016 10:26  AM" data-short="7 yr">July 20, 2016</time> by Jeb-head-mug kerman**
Well if Bob is stranded there, then I hope the sattelite at least can provide decent internet speed so bob have someone to talk to  :-)

Congrats on Duna. Bob will live for hundreds of years with a big stupid grin on his face. After all, there are many more places left to strand Kerbals.

Enjoy!
